title: Subpart 5-1 - Public Water Systems
content:
Subpart 5-1 - Public Water Systems

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 5-1.1 to 5-1.2)

Sources of Water Supply (§ 5-1.10 to 5-1.15)

Planning, Siting, Treatment and Approval (§ 5-1.20 to 5-1.33)

Control of Copper and Lead in Drinking Water (§ 5-1.40 to 5-1.49)

Public Water Systems; Maximum Contaminant Levels; Monitoring Requirements; Notifications Required (§ 5-1.50 to 5-1.55)

Monitoring and Control of Disinfection Byproduct Precursors (§ 5-1.60 to 5-1.65)

Operation and Quality Control (§ 5-1.70 to 5-1.79)

Enhanced Treatment For Cryptosporidium (§ 5-1.80 to 5-1.84)

Variances and Exemptions (§ 5-1.90 to 5-1.96)

Separability (§ 5-1.100)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
